name: Fluid Simulations
description: Worked with Pugstorm on my master thesis and looked into improving and comparing different fluid simulation for their game Corekeeper.

name: WebFighting
description: Web-based 3D-Multiplayer game in the works! Using ThreeJS for graphics and physics and SocketIO for network logic.

name: TabsShare
description: Simple guitar tabulature website made for me and my dad to share tabs. Made using the MERN-Stack.

name: PokeChart
description: Pokemon graph and visualization for a data visualization course, made with Python and its libraries: Bokeh and Pands.

name: Corporate Combat
description: AR multiplayer strategy game created in Unity with classmates for my bachelor project.

name: Color me Home
description: Find you way back home to the woods in this small puzzle game made in Unreal Engine, where you play as a chameleon with different abilities.

name: Procedural Clouds
description: Simple fun little school project that creates procedurally generated lofi clouds around a spinning earth.

name: Monte-Carlo Raytracer
description: Custom raytracing renderer made from scratch using the Monte-Carlo raytracing techinque in C++.

name: Image Reproduction
description: Reproduction of images using smaller images implemented in Matlab.
